text.text_translated:
Julie Wong is a very important researcher. She works with robots and AI.
She wrote many, many papers. She wrote more than 50 papers. She wrote some papers alone. She wrote some papers with other people. These papers are in very important science magazines. Other scientists check these papers first.
She often gives talks to scientists from many countries. In 2012, she got a very important award. It was the Royal Academy Simone Fielding fellowship. This award was for her research.
Julie lives with her family. She lives in a smart house. She made the plans for this house herself.
